short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: An auto fill service to help booking train tickets by automating form filling in IRCTC website.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
IRCTC Tatkal autofill is a browser plugin which help user to book ticket on IRCTC website.

It support 3 payment method UPI QR, UPI ID and Irctc wallet. Wallet is the fastest payment option.

Instruction:
1) Fill subscriber username password and all the required information in the tool and click save button.

2) In mobile be ready with UPI QR scanner app like Paytm etc to immediately scan the QR code once it appears Or approve payment notification/SMS/OTP once it received.

3) Click Book button 2-3 minute before tatkal timing. Extension will automatically login and search the train with selected travel date and class.

Note: In case of TATKAL booking, If you click Book button before 10 or 11 AM, then after login into IRCTC website, extension will wait for time to reach 10 or 11 AM then it will automatically click on Book button on desired train and class on train list page and continue to next page. You may scroll up and down on page to keep session active while extension is waiting.

4) On passenger info page It will automatically fill the passenger data and continue to next page.

5) On the review page, if captcha submit mode is selected as Auto then it will automatically submit the captcha else carefully review the auto filled captcha and hit enter button, it will automatically select the payment options and continue.

6) Scan the QR code/approve payment request in notification/SMS, wait for booking status.

Tips for Tatkal ticket booking: 

1) Make sure you have high speed and reliable internet connection.

2) Try from at least 2-3 IRCTC account in multiple device like laptops, mobiles or Multiple browser like edge, Mozilla, Firefox with different Irctc account.

To use this extension in mobile, install kiwi browser from google pay store then go to setting-- extensions-- select add from store option.

Or

To use this extension with different IRCTC account at the same time on same device(laptop) on google chrome, create multiple guest profile in chrome(Account--Add new profile) then add the extension in to that profile. One drawback of multiple profile is it might slow down the browser.

Advantage of booking from multiple irctc account is that if one fails due to some reason other instance may still work, make payment for the one which goes to payment page first.

3) Practice the tool 1-2 time in GENERAL quota for same train number before tatkal booking, if possible try one day before on TATKAL quota, so that you get an idea how it works and if all details are correctly filled.

4) Never close Irctc website directly without logout.

5) Close and logout all previously open Irctc website before using in the extension to avoid session expired/logout error.

6) Click Book button 2-3 minute before tatkal timing. You may scroll up and down on page to keep session active while extension is waiting.

*********READ BELOW BEFORE PURCHASE***********

This extension is build to help user get confirm tatkal ticket by automating form filling, clicking so that user can quickly reach to payment page.

Remember that we don't give any kind of guarantee to get you confirmed ticket. If your ticket not booked, got Waiting list, Irctc logout automatically, website hung/failed, payment hung, Payment deducted etc, it's not a fault of our extension and No REFUND is possible on purchased plan.

For payment related issue you need to contact IRCTC or Payment gateway, not us.

In the extension we are storing subscriber and IRCTC login credential, mobile number, Passenger details, UPI ID etc locally on browser's local storage, these data never sent outside of extension.

If you are agree with above and understand how extension works then only purchase the plan and use the extension.

We strongly recommend to try demo booking on TATKAL quota at 10 AM or 11 AM one day before of actual booking, so you get to know if extension working or not at peak load, if it looks promising then only buy the plan.

For extension demo username is "DemoUser" and password is "DemoUser1234"

We strongly recommend to follow the tricks mentioned above to increase chance of getting successful ticket.

DISCLAIMER: This extension is made for personal use only. Any attempt to use this tool for unauthorized access or activities that violate IRCTC terms of service or legal regulations is strictly prohibited. The author(s) and associated entities are not responsible for any misuse or legal consequences resulting from the use of this tool for any unauthorized activities.

Please share you experience with the extension and if any issues/concern/feedback on review section.
